dmca.title: Complaint from "The Far Side" to Google
dmca.body:
From: XXXXX
September 9, 2002
    
Google, Inc.
    
Re: Reproduction of The Far Side cartoons.
    
To whom it may concern:
    
Please be advised that the following web site is in violation of copyright law with their illegal reproduction of "The Far Side" by Gary Larson.    
      
http://ptty.loxinfo.co.th/~jburen/farside.htm
    
We have contacted the site contact several times and requested that they remove the offending images. The contact information is as follows:
 
XXXXX

They have failed to do so. Therefore, on behalf of FarWorks, Inc. and Mr. Larson, I am requesting that you delist this site in the Google Image Search. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that, for each image identified above, I either own the copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
    
Please let me know that this has been done. Thank you for 
your time and consideration.    
           
Regards,

XXXXX
Permissions Department
